content: k2* repeat until halfway marker or last 32 k3* repeat until end of row stitches k to end of row row 2 *k3 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 k5 p1 k1 p1 extra large k2*repeat until halfway marker or last 32 row 1 *k4 p1 k1 p1 k7 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 stitches k to end of row k3* repeat until end of row small large row 1 *k3 p1 k1 p1 k6 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 k3* repeat until halfway marker or last 36 stitches k to end of row row 2 *k3 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 k6 p1 k1 p1 k3* repeat until halfway marker or last 36 stitches k to end of row extra large row 1 *k4 p1 k1 p1 k7 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 k3* repeat until halfway marker or last 40 medium stitches k to end of row row 2 *k4 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 k7 p1 k1 p1 k3* repeat until halfway marker or last 40 stitches k to end of row work row 1-4 until foot is about 1-1/4 shorter than the length of your foot trying on the sock can be helpful to determine how long to knit your sock foot if you want a more snug fit knit fewer row for a more relaxed fit knit additional row for a us women s size 7 5 i knit 64 large rounds toe row 1 k1 ssk knit to last 2 stitches before halfway marker k2tog k1 repeat for second half of stitches 4 stitches decreased per round row 2 k all stitches work until 40 stitches total row 3 k1 ssk knit to last 2 stitches before halfway marker k2tog extra large k1 repeat for second half of stitches 4 stitches decreased per round repeat row 3 until you have 20 stitches graft or kitchener toe closed knit purl slip_stitch purl-wise with yarn in back
